name: A black strip made from gauzes
data: It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It decreases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
